com.box.sdk

Class BoxTransactionalAPIConnection

  • Object
    • BoxAPIConnection
      • BoxTransactionalAPIConnection

  • public class BoxTransactionalAPIConnection
extends BoxAPIConnection
    Represents an authenticated transactional connection to the Box API.

    This class handles everything for transactional API that isn't already handled by BoxAPIConnection.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionConnection

        public static BoxAPIConnection getTransactionConnection(String accessToken,
                                                        String scope)
        Request a scoped transactional token.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - application access token.
        scope - scope of transactional token.
        Returns:
        a BoxAPIConnection which can be used to perform transactional requests.

      • getTransactionConnection

        public static BoxAPIConnection getTransactionConnection(String accessToken,
                                                        String scope,
                                                        String resource)
        Request a scoped transactional token for a particular resource.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - application access token.
        scope - scope of transactional token.
        resource - resource transactional token has access to.
        Returns:
        a BoxAPIConnection which can be used to perform transactional requests.

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(String authCode)
        Disabling the non-Box Developer Edition authenticate method.
        Overrides:
        authenticate in class BoxAPIConnection
        Parameters:
        authCode - an auth code obtained from the first half of the OAuth process.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Box Transactional API does not support authentication with an auth code

      • canRefresh

        public boolean canRefresh()
        BoxTransactionalAPIConnection can never refresh.
        Overrides:
        canRefresh in class BoxAPIConnection
        Returns:
        false always.

      • setAutoRefresh

        public void setAutoRefresh(boolean autoRefresh)
        Auto refresh is not available for transactional auth.
        Overrides:
        setAutoRefresh in class BoxAPIConnection
        Parameters:
        autoRefresh - true to enable auto token refresh; otherwise false.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Box Transactional API tokens can not be refreshed

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Transactional auth does not support token refreshes.
        Overrides:
        refresh in class BoxAPIConnection
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Box Transactional API tokens can not be refreshed
